ModMetaData.description:
Enables AI agents to observe and control RimWorld colonies through the Game-RL protocol.
Features: - ColonyManager agent for strategic colony control - Work priority management - Colonist drafting and movement - Resource and threat observations - Deterministic seeding for reproducible experiments
For research and training purposes.
